author: raghushantha
body: On *nix system, [Test-RunningAsElevated](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/Modules/Shared/PowerShellGet/PSModule.psm1#L7394) needs to use SUDO_UID env variable to figure out that it is running in SUDO mode
title: Update Test-RunningAsElevated in PowerShellGet to work agnostic to platform
